content: decorate for christmas with these beautiful and charming gnomes 1 with christmas hats who shyly hide under the hood crocheted in our delicious rainbow cotton yarn 2 and the beard is made of go handmade twist yarn 3 originally used in the pattern lammy polar perfect for beard hair etc **materials ** crochet hook size b1-c2 2 5mm rainbow cotton 8/4 go handmade twist yarn poly pellets fiberfill **measurements ** approx 5 9 inches 15 cm tall **usage ** approx dark red /light gray 0 53 oz 15 g gray 0 53 15 g nude 0 07 oz 2 g polar 0 1 oz 3 g **abbreviations ** **magic_ring** magic_ring **chain** chain stitch **s** stitch **sts** sticthes **single_crochet** single_crochet **blo** back loop only **slip_stitch** slip_stitch 1 https //hobbii com/shy-christmas-gnomes utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=shy-chrismas-gnomes&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/rainbow-cotton-8-4 utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=rainbow84&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/twist-50g utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=go-handmade-twist&utm_term=swr
